local_intent: Approach and precisely align to the dishwasher handle before grasp.
assumptions: Robot is already near the dishwasher; handle within reachable workspace
coherence_with_global: Uses the same detect/scan fallback, then verifies visibility and executes the annotated ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.01, timeout 1500), finishing with a positional check before subsequent grasp steps in the GLOBAL_BT.
